title: System
description: A system is a collection of processors and wires which when loaded represent an actual block diagram. A system can be thought of as a directed multigraph.

ID.title: ID
ID.description: A unique identifier for the system.

Processors.title: Processors
Processors.description: A list of processor IDs that are part of the system.

Wires.title: Wires
Wires.description: A list of wire IDs that are part of the system.
